objective: Produce release-candidate documentation and onboarding assets aligned with the finalized implementation.
scope_in: Update architecture document to reflect final runtime behavior
Publish quickstart and troubleshooting runbook for clean-machine setup
Document API contracts and schema/version support policy
Document test strategy and required merge gates
Prepare release notes and known limitations
implementation_checklist: Refresh README and docs/ARCHITECTURE.md against final system behavior
Add RELEASE.md with setup, test, and demo commands
Add CONTRIBUTING.md quality gate expectations and branch workflow
Include examples for typed turn and voice turn usage
Record final closeout status in PROJECT.md
acceptance_criteria: A new contributor can run setup and demo flows without tribal knowledge
Docs match current APIs and behavior with no placeholder sections
Release notes capture shipped scope and known constraints
handoff_artifacts: project status update with release-candidate date
risks: Docs drift if implementation changes late in closeout
Mitigation: docs update is part of final merge gate, not post-merge task
